item.description: Let's go over to the Harvest Cafe. Have some good food and I hope desert too! Let's meet around 10am give or take a few min....weather should be a little nicer so get out of the house and join us! By the way one of our members is one of the owners of this little cafe. We are supporting them as a meet-up group. So come along for some good conversation and food. See you there.
item.how_to_find_us: Just look for the table having the most fun!

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: Breakfast-Harvest Cafe
